Please check the Voucher's correct pricing on the Solv dApp before buying or making an offer.

Convertible Voucher #1 of PERP. Convertible Voucher is a structured product that can be converted into a predetermined number of tokens or stablecoins under certain conditions.

At maturity, the holders are paid the face value in stablecoins if the settlement price falls into the bond range. Otherwise, the Voucher will convert to an amount of tokens redeemable by the holder.
